Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Relates to the applicability of the residential redevelopment inhibited property exemption
Summary: Relates to expanding the applicability of the residential redevelopment inhibited property exemption to all cities, town, or villages in the state.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to the applicability of the residential redevelopment inhibited property exemption to all localities in the state
